posts.post_content:
I'm looking for any T205's in that are in pretty bad shape.  In the process of working on my set.

Thanks,
Tucker

Tucker,

Pup (Andrew) has a rather big collection of T205's for sale further down on this section.

r/
Frank

Thanks for pointing that out.  He does say that he is looking to sell them as a group though and currently I'm not looking to spend quite that much.  Do you think it would be worth getting in touch with him anyway?  Thank you for the the help.

Tucker
Marc Delpercio, you might want to try him I know he had a few cubs up recently that are low grade and priced low too...

[quote name="Trl3789" post=877193]Thanks for pointing that out.  He does say that he is looking to sell them as a group though and currently I'm not looking to spend quite that much.  Do you think it would be worth getting in touch with him anyway?  Thank you for the the help.

Tucker[/QUOTE]

Tucker,

I would get in touch with him.  I know that he is selling that group as a lot, but he may have others that he would be willing to sell separately.  

I agree Marc is also a good person to check with.

r/
Frank

Hey Patrick and Frank,
Thanks for mentioning me.  Tucker, I do have quite a few T205's available.  I just listed a lot on the B/S/T a few days ago that included a few low grade cards.  I'm willing to sell them individually.  I have about 100 other T205's, mostly a bit nicer mid-grade but a few low grade ones.  I'd be glad to send you my full list if you'd like.  Feel free to send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] if you're interested.

I've got a handful.

send wantlist to:
[url]scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url]
